name: Lust Vessel
description:
Lust Vessel follows the story of Kate as she goes on a space cruise for her vacation with her best friend, after getting drunk she wakes up alone some days later to find out that everyone has lost themselves to passion. Now Kate need to find out happened on the days that she was drunk, what happened to her best friend and maybe solve this problem.

Features

Over 70 scenes
14 different endings
Different routes for the game, each with different enemies
Every character can be romanced and has at least two endings

Disclaimer
All characters involved in any sexual act in Lust Vessel are over 18 years old.
